transactions_tmp = stdocuments.unionByName(stmanualjournal, allowMissingColumns = True).unionByName(stdirectposting, allowMissingColumns = True).unionByName(stgeneraljournal, allowMissingColumns = True).unionByName(ststocktransactions, allowMissingColumns = True).unionByName(stdiscountjournal, allowMissingColumns = True).unionByName(stsalesinvoiceinventory, allowMissingColumns = True).unionByName(ststockrevaluations, allowMissingColumns = True).unionByName(stpurchasepricevariance, allowMissingColumns = True).unionByName(stcostofgoods, allowMissingColumns = True)

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
sttransactions_tmp2
AS
SELECT 
    t.sap_transactionsline_polookupid
    ,t.sap_transactionsheader_docentry 
    ,t.sap_transactionsheader_docnum 
    ,t.sap_transactionsheader_doctype 
    ,t.sap_transactionsheader_objtype 
    ,t.sap_transactionsheader_postingdate 
    ,t.sap_transactionsheader_duedate 
    ,t.sap_transactionsheader_cardcode 
    ,t.sap_transactionsheader_cardref 
    ,t.sap_transactionsheader_discprcnt 
    ,t.sap_transactionsheader_discsum 
    ,t.sap_transactionsheader_doctotal 
    ,t.sap_transactionsheader_comments 
    ,t.sap_transactionsheader_transid 
    ,t.sap_transactionsheader_u_expense_depot 
    ,t.sap_transactionsline_linenum 
    ,t.sap_transactionsline_linestatus 
    ,t.sap_transactionsline_itemcode 
    ,t.sap_transactionsline_dscription 
    ,t.sap_transactionsline_quantity 
    ,t.sap_transactionsline_openqty 
    ,t.sap_transactionsline_price 
    ,t.sap_transactionsline_rate 
    ,t.sap_transactionsline_discprcnt 
    ,t.sap_transactionsline_linetotal
    -- ,(sap_transactionsline_linetotal+sap_transactionsline_discsum) as sap_transactionsline_linetotallessdiscount
    ,(sap_transactionsline_linetotal+(sap_transactionsline_linetotal*(sap_transactionsheader_discprcnt*-1/100))) as sap_transactionsline_linetotallessdiscount
    ,t.sap_transactionsline_opensum 
    ,t.sap_transactionsline_pricebefdi 
    ,t.sap_transactionsline_docdate 
    ,t.sap_transactionsline_project 
    ,t.sap_transactionsline_vatprcnt 
    ,t.sap_transactionsline_vatgroup 
    ,t.sap_transactionsline_vatamount 
    ,t.sap_transactionsline_u_reason 
    ,t.sap_transactionsline_u_expenseitem 
    ,t.sap_transactionsline_u_fueldate 
    ,t.sap_transactionsline_acctcode 
    ,t.sap_transactionsline_doccat 
    ,COALESCE(t.sap_transactionsline_subdepotcode,c.sap_account_segment_2) sap_transactionsline_subdepotcode
    ,t.sap_transactionsline_u_rate 
    ,t.sap_transactionsline_u_ir_number 
    ,t.sap_transactionsline_discsum 
    ,t.sap_transactionsline_vatrate 
    ,t.sap_transactionsline_description 
    ,t.sap_transactionsline_jnlref1 
    ,t.sap_transactionsline_jnlref2 
    ,i.sap_item_invntitem as sap_transactionsline_invntitem
    ,CASE 
		WHEN (t.sap_transactionsline_doccat = 'salesinvoice' and i.sap_item_invntitem = 'Y') THEN 1
		WHEN (t.sap_transactionsline_doccat = 'goodsreturn' and c.sap_account_groupmask IN (5,6)) THEN 1
		WHEN (t.sap_transactionsline_doccat NOT IN ('generaljournal','manualjournal','directposting') and c.sap_account_groupmask IN (1,2,3)) THEN 1
		ELSE 0
	END as exclude

FROM transactions_tmp t
LEFT JOIN stchartofaccounts c on c.sap_account_acctcode = t.sap_transactionsline_acctcode
LEFT JOIN stitems i on i.sap_item_itemcode = t.sap_transactionsline_itemcode
WHERE c.sap_account_accttype <> 'COST RECOVERY'
AND t.sap_transactionsheader_postingdate >= '2016-04-01 00:00:00.000'

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
sttransactionsexceptions
AS
SELECT 

    sap_transactionsheader_cardcode
    ,sap_transactionsline_acctcode
    ,sap_transactionsline_itemcode
    ,to_date(sap_transactionsheader_postingdate,"dd/MM/yyyy") as sap_transactionsheader_postingdate
    ,sap_transactionsline_subdepotcode
    ,sap_transactionsline_doccat
    ,sap_transactionsheader_docnum
    ,sap_transactionsline_project
    ,sap_transactionsline_linetotal 
    ,sap_transactionsline_linetotal as sap_transactionsline_linetotallessdiscount
    ,sap_transactionsline_linetotal as sap_transactionsline_linetotalfinal
    ,sap_transactionsheader_cardref
    ,sap_transactionsheader_comments
    ,sap_transactionsheader_transid
    ,sap_transactionsline_u_ir_number
    --,sap_transactionsline_goodsreceiptnumber
    ,sap_transactionsline_exception

FROM exceptions

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
sttransactionsdetail_tmp
AS
SELECT 
  t.sap_transactionsline_polookupid
  ,t.sap_transactionsheader_docentry 
  ,t.sap_transactionsheader_docnum 
  ,t.sap_transactionsheader_doctype 
  ,t.sap_transactionsheader_objtype 
  ,to_date(t.sap_transactionsheader_postingdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as sap_transactionsheader_postingdate
  ,to_date(t.sap_transactionsheader_duedate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as sap_transactionsheader_duedate
  ,t.sap_transactionsheader_cardcode 
  ,t.sap_transactionsheader_cardref 
  ,t.sap_transactionsheader_discprcnt 
  ,t.sap_transactionsheader_discsum 
  ,t.sap_transactionsheader_doctotal 
  ,t.sap_transactionsheader_comments 
  ,t.sap_transactionsheader_transid 
  ,t.sap_transactionsheader_u_expense_depot 
  ,t.sap_transactionsline_linenum 
  ,t.sap_transactionsline_linestatus 
  ,t.sap_transactionsline_itemcode 
  ,t.sap_transactionsline_dscription 
  ,t.sap_transactionsline_quantity 
  ,t.sap_transactionsline_openqty 
  ,t.sap_transactionsline_price 
  ,t.sap_transactionsline_rate 
  ,t.sap_transactionsline_discprcnt 
  ,t.sap_transactionsline_linetotal
  ,t.sap_transactionsline_linetotallessdiscount
  ,COALESCE(t.sap_transactionsline_linetotallessdiscount,t.sap_transactionsline_linetotal) as sap_transactionsline_linetotalfinal
  ,CASE 
      WHEN 
      t.sap_transactionsline_doccat in ('generaljournal','purchaseorder') THEN 0
      ELSE COALESCE(t.sap_transactionsline_linetotallessdiscount,t.sap_transactionsline_linetotal)
    END as sap_transactionsline_linetotalfinalexclgjpo
  ,t.sap_transactionsline_opensum 
  ,t.sap_transactionsline_pricebefdi 
  ,to_date(t.sap_transactionsline_docdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as  sap_transactionsline_docdate
  ,t.sap_transactionsline_project 
  ,t.sap_transactionsline_vatprcnt 
  ,t.sap_transactionsline_vatgroup 
  ,t.sap_transactionsline_vatamount 
  ,t.sap_transactionsline_u_reason 
  ,t.sap_transactionsline_u_expenseitem 
  ,to_date(t.sap_transactionsline_u_fueldate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as sap_transactionsline_u_fueldate
  ,t.sap_transactionsline_acctcode 
  ,t.sap_transactionsline_doccat 
  ,t.sap_transactionsline_subdepotcode 
  ,t.sap_transactionsline_u_rate 
  ,t.sap_transactionsline_u_ir_number 
  ,t.sap_transactionsline_discsum 
  ,t.sap_transactionsline_vatrate 
  ,t.sap_transactionsline_description 
  ,t.sap_transactionsline_jnlref1 
  ,t.sap_transactionsline_jnlref2 
  ,t.sap_transactionsline_invntitem 

FROM sttransactions_tmp2 t
WHERE t.exclude = 0

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
sttransactionssummary
AS
SELECT 
   sap_transactionsline_acctcode
  ,sap_transactionsline_doccat
  ,to_date(sap_transactionsheader_postingdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as sap_transactionsheader_postingdate
  ,sap_transactionsline_subdepotcode
  ,SUM(sap_transactionsline_linetotal) sap_transactionsline_linetotal
  ,SUM(sap_transactionsline_linetotalfinal) sap_transactionsline_linetotalfinal
  ,SUM(sap_transactionsline_linetotalfinal) sap_transactionsline_linetotalfinalexclgjpo
FROM sttransactionsdetail t
GROUP BY
	sap_transactionsline_acctcode,
  sap_transactionsheader_postingdate,
  sap_transactionsline_doccat,
  sap_transactionsline_subdepotcode
